text: Calo, Caló, or Calò may refer to: * Caló language, the language of the Iberian nomadic Romani tribe ** Iberian Kale (calé): *** Romani people in Spain, more frequently called gitanos *** Romani people in Portugal, more frequently called ciganos * Caló (Chicano), slang of Mexican-American Spanish * Calo (Roman fort), a Roman army encampment near Xanten. People: * Calò (surname), an Italian surname * Caló (surname), an Iberian surname * Super Caló, stage name of Mexican professional wrestler Rafael García Calo, Calones * Calones, military slaves of Ancient Rome
title: Calo
